channel.title: Run.bat opens and closes
channel.description:
umm how do i fix this problem:
the client run.bat opens and closes rely fast and client doesnt run on this computer
>> the client runs normally on other computers
any ideas?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2009, 02:39:30 pm[/size][hr]oops wrong section :[

item.title: Run.bat opens and closes
item.dc:creator: @darkblaze darkblaze
item.description:
@darkblaze wrote:

well u need to right-click it and then select edit and after all the things written there u type “pause”

this will fix ur problem

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat opens and closes
item.dc:creator: @dear_god1 dear god
item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:2, topic:265411”]Right click — Edit

Make sure you’ve got the PATH set for ant and java -_-;[/quote]

You don’t set path’s for ant in clients.

change your run.bat to this

@echo off
java -classpath rscd.jar;lib/xpp3.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/hex-string.jar;lib/mail.jar;lib/activation.jar;lib/jmf.jar org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient
pause

Read full topic
